name: Swipe Right (husain)
description:
*Content Warnings*: transphobia, TERFs, anti-Black and anti-Asian racism, fetishization

Play as a martian messing around in an Earth queer dating app, and inadvertently learning more about humans in the process! Use different human profiles to interact with your potential matches and experience a couple of ways that online dating platforms work differently for BIPOC queer people. 

This game was made by the staff of Games for Justice 2021:

  • Zarya Ajasin
  • Ishika Jha
  • Sandra Latt
  • Kiara Vincent
  • Husain Rizvi

Games for Justice is a summer program for Boston youth of color who want to engage in an economically democratic, collectively-lead, and transformative justice-centered game studio. We created this over the course of 4-6 hours together to create an example of what the scope for our games this summer might look like.

This is our first draft and version of the game.
